sentences.en: Fortunately for him, he can swim.
sentences.cn: 对他来说幸运的是, 他会游泳.

sentences.en: Fortunately for me, my friend saw that something was seriously wrong.
sentences.cn: 对我来说幸运的是，我的朋友发现了非常严重的错误。

sentences.en: Fortunately for me, my kids are of the persuasion that their failings are of their own making.
sentences.cn: 对我来说幸运的是，我的孩子们相信失败是他们自己造成的。

sentences.en: Fortunately it didn't cause a disaster.
Fortunately the rain stopped before we started.
sentences.cn: 幸亏在我们动身前雨停了.

sentences.en: Fortunately you had enough gumption not to give up on yours.
sentences.cn: 幸亏你有这个毅力坚持自己的梦想.

sentences.en: Fortunately, everything worked out all right in the end.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，最后一切顺利。

sentences.en: Fortunately, some people are more stubborn and persistent than others.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是, 一些人比其他人更加坚持,更加矢志不渝.

sentences.en: Fortunately, such cowboy firms are becoming rarer.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，这样的欺诈公司越来越少了。

sentences.en: Fortunately, the chore of leaf sweeping is well worth the effort.
sentences.cn: 幸运的是，干清扫落叶这个活儿是值得的。

sentences.en: Fortunately, the storm only did minimal damage to the farmer's crops.
sentences.cn: 很幸运, 暴风雨只使农民的庄稼受到轻微的损害.

sentences.en: Fortunately, the stormy waves caused trifling damage to the boat.
sentences.cn: 幸好, 风浪使船只受到的损坏较轻.

sentences.en: I was late in getting to the station, but fortunately for me, the train was late too.
sentences.cn: 我到达火车站时已经迟了, 但是幸亏火车也误了点.

sentences.en: It was fortunately hidden from view.
The plane had a breakdown in the air, but it was fortunately removed by the ace pilot.
sentences.cn: 飞机在空中发生了故障, 但幸运的是被王牌驾驶员排除了.

sentences.en: The thick clouds passed overhead, but fortunately the rain kept off the whole day.
sentences.cn: 虽然乌云密布, 但很幸运地一整天都没下雨.

words.tran_cn: 幸运的；侥幸的；吉祥的；带来幸运的
